analysis.key_quote: I oppose this rule on the grounds that it will only further the problems facing the United States now that so many positions are being filled with incompetent individuals whose only "qualifications" are their blind loyalty to the President.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule, highlighting concerns about politicization and the undermining of merit-based hiring practices, which aligns with the themes of merit-based system concerns and politicization.
